results.content: Friendship is Love without his wings!
results.author: Lord Byron

results.content: A short saying often contains much wisdom.
results.author: Sophocles

results.content: Wisdom is a kind of knowledge. It is knowledge of the nature, career, and consequences of human values.
results.author: Sidney Hook

results.content: The three great essentials to achieve anything worth while are: Hard work, Stick-to-itiveness, and Common sense.
results.author: Thomas Edison

results.content: We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
results.author: Albert Schweitzer

results.content: Applause is a receipt, not a bill.
results.author: Dale Carnegie

results.content: A hero is no braver than an ordinary man, but he is braver five minutes longer.
results.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

results.content: The eye sees only what the mind is prepared to comprehend.
results.author: Henri Bergson

results.content: Take things as they are. Punch when you have to punch. Kick when you have to kick.
results.author: Bruce Lee

results.content: Can you imagine what I would do if I could do all I can?
results.author: Sun Tzu

results.content: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
results.author: Jimi Hendrix

results.content: Real magic in relationships means an absence of judgement of others.
results.author: Wayne Dyer

results.content: Whatever happens, take responsibility.
results.author: Tony Robbins

results.content: Kind words do not cost much. Yet they accomplish much.
results.author: Blaise Pascal

results.content: You can tell whether a man is clever by his answers. You can tell whether a man is wise by his questions.
results.author: Naguib Mahfouz

results.content: Skill to do comes of doing.
results.author: Ralph Emerso

results.content: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
results.author: Carl Jung

results.content: By believing passionately in something that does not yet exist, we create it.
results.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

results.content: Give me a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it, and I shall move the world.
results.author: Archimedes

results.content: Science and technology revolutionize our lives, but memory, tradition and myth frame our response.
results.author: Arthur M. Schlesinger Jr.

results.content: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspication.
results.author: Thomas Edison

results.content: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
results.author: Abraham Lincoln

results.content: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
results.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

results.content: Fate is in your hands and no one elses.
results.author: Byron Pulsifer

results.content: Well begun is half done.
results.author: Aristotle

results.content: Self-complacency is fatal to progress.
results.author: Margaret Sangster

results.content: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
results.author: Buddha

results.content: We can only learn to love by loving.
results.author: Iris Murdoch

results.content: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
results.author: Karen Clark

results.content: Having nothing, nothing can he lose.
results.author: William Shakespear

results.content: A rolling stone gathers no moss
results.author: Publilius Syrus

results.content: Everything in life is luck.
results.author: Donald Trump

results.content: From error to error one discovers the entire truth.
results.author: Sigmund Freud

results.content: Well done is better than well said.
results.author: Benjamin Franklin

results.content: Once you choose hope, anythings possible.
results.author: Christopher Reeve

results.content: Be as you wish to seem.
results.author: Socrates

results.content: Never mistake activity for achievement.
results.author: John Wooden

results.content: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
results.author: Dalai Lama

results.content: A weed is no more than a flower in disguise.
results.author: James Lowell

results.content: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
results.author: Napoleon Hill
